title: Canada 'heat dome' leads to record temperatures, as climate crisis makes extreme heat more common
content:
1. Canada 'heat dome' leads to record temperatures, as climate crisis makes extreme heat more common  Channel 4 News
  2. Canada records highest temperature ever amid heat wave  Fox News
  3. Canada sets record temperature of almost 116 degrees amid heat wave, forecasts of even hotter weather  The Washington Post
  4. Temperature in Kamloops surpasses all time high, reaches 45.8 C: Environment Canada - Kamloops News  Castanet.net
  5. "Heat wave in Canada" [what is causing the heat wave?]: How Canada temperature be  BBC News

localize.title: カナダの「ヒートドーム」が記録的な気温をもたらし、気候危機により猛暑が常態化
